# [Interview #974: AMOL Signing Report - J. Dauro, Entry #69](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=974#69)

#### Question

How did you become a writer? What advice (can you give)?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Practice, just practice. And don't stress it too much.
